Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 Galvatron walked infront of the large lake. He hovered over it for a few 
minutes. Looking for the signal of his ship. He pressed a few key button and 
the ship surfaced. Its name was the Colossus. It set down a few miles from 
the water. Galvatron opened up the hull door and walked inside. He saw all 
his comrade in stasis lock in the pods.

OOC: if anyone wants a pred char just make one of  the pods open up and make 
a new char.

--part1_19d.4daecfa.2a5b38e5_boundary

Galvatron opened up the hull door and walked inside. He saw all his comrade in stasis lock in the pods.
